actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976, as amended, to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept volunteer services in aid of the work of the Bureau of Land Management.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept the services of volunteers to assist in the work conducted through the Bureau of Land Management. Prohibits the use of such workers in firefighting or law enforcement activities or in the policymaking processes of such Department. Permits the Secretary to provide incidental expenses in the utilization of such volunteers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976, as amended, to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept volunteer services in aid of the work of the Bureau of Land Management.
